original: Dahlberg, Lars Eric Martin Cle-mensson, överstelöjtnant, Hemsjö, f. 20/6/85 i Färingtofta, Krist. 1., av un-d:löjtn. Filip D. o. Augusta Clemens-son. G. 22 m. Hilma Carlsson. Barn: Brita f. 22. — Stud:ex. i Lund 04, off :-ex. v. Karlberg 07, KHS 13-15. Stud:-resa t. Ryssl. vintern 11-12. Und:-löjtn. v. N. skånska inf :reg. 07, löjtn. 11, kapt. 23, major i armén 34, avsk. 35, överstelöjtn. 42. Befälh. f. Karlshamns ro nr 11 35-42, tf. befälh. f. Karlshamns fo 41-42, befälh. f. Kristianstads fo nr 14 42-45. Ordf. i Fo 14:s kamratförb. Skr.: Skåne o. Regementet (36). RSO, RNO.
translated: Dahlberg, Lars Eric Martin Cle-mensson, Lieutenant Colonel, Hemsjö, b. 20/6/85 in Färingtofta, Krist. 1., son of 2nd Lieutenant Filip D. and Augusta Clemens-son. Married on 22/xx to Hilma Carlsson. Children: Brita b. 22. Graduated from Lund University in 1904, Officer's Exam at Karlberg in 1907, attended KHS from 1913-1915. Studied in Russia in the winter of 1911-1912. Second Lieutenant in the North Skåne Infantry Regiment in 1907, promoted to Lieutenant in 1911, Captain in 1923, Major in the Army in 1934, retired in 1935, promoted to Lieutenant Colonel in 1942. Commander for Karlshamns coastal artillery nr 11 from 1935-1942, temporary commander for Karlshamns fortification from 1941-1942, commander for Kristianstad's fortification nr 14 from 1942-1945. Chairman of the Association of Comrades for Fortification nr 14. Written works include "Skåne and the Regiment" (1936). Awarded with the Order of the Sword and the Order of the North Star.

experience.name: Second Lieutenant in the North Skåne Infantry Regiment
promoted to Major in the Army
Commander for Karlshamns coastal artillery nr 11
